channel.title: Olympus! Lets go somewhere
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/300r24x.png[/img][/CENTER]
Olympus is a brand new 317 server. It was released 2 days ago and we our now online 24/7!
Webclient: [url=http://ps-olympus.webs.com/webclient]ps-olympus - Webclient[/url]
Note: Remember Olympus is a brand new server. I know we have a lot of work and development still to do. Any advice/suggestions would be awesome!
Features: - Webclient, Download client, forums, home page - Crystal key chest gives 3rd age. All monsters drop crystal keys. - Custom mage bank minigame! Play for colored infinity and more magic related prizes. - Player titles - Custom chill zone, donator zone, train zone, and help zone. - dungeoneering and summoning - funpk - Lottery ticket system - Completionist cape reward for 1000 NPC kills - Working EP system and random EP drops - Custom Quests as well as achievments (Coming within the next few days) - Great staff - Friendly community :)
Cleared out custom home:[/COLOR] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/15mfxug.png[/img]

item.title: Olympus! Lets go somewhere
item.dc:creator: @DevinCooley DevinCooley
item.description:
@DevinCooley wrote:

[CENTER][/CENTER]

Olympus is a brand new 317 server. It was released 2 days ago and we our now online 24/7!

Webclient: ps-olympus - Webclient

Note: Remember Olympus is a brand new server. I know we have a lot of work and development still to do. Any advice/suggestions would be awesome!

Features:

  • Webclient, Download client, forums, home page
  • Crystal key chest gives 3rd age. All monsters drop crystal keys.
  • Custom mage bank minigame! Play for colored infinity and more magic related prizes.
  • Player titles
  • Custom chill zone, donator zone, train zone, and help zone.
  • dungeoneering and summoning
  • funpk
  • Lottery ticket system
  • Completionist cape reward for 1000 NPC kills
  • Working EP system and random EP drops
  • Custom Quests as well as achievments (Coming within the next few days)
  • Great staff
  • Friendly community
